name: Fire Safe Europe
goal:
Fire Safe Europe (FSEU) is a broad and unique alliance of fire experts, researchers, fire fighters, European associations, and international companies manufacturing and supplying cables, concrete, ceilings, fire protection equipment and insulation.
FSEUâ€™s mission is to raise the profile of fire safety in buildings in the EU, by advocating for a European fire safety strategy and better regulation for fire safety.
interests: Consumer Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Public Health
